exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat sigma : name -> data Hlocks : locks_correct sigma Hqueue : queue (sigma Server) = [] c : Client_index Unable to unify "locks_correct sigma" with "held (sigma (Client c)) = false".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false

Premises:
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
queue = fun d : Data => let (queue, _) := d in queue : Data -> list Client_index
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
held = fun d : Data => let (_, held) := d in held : Data -> bool
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
all_clients_false_locks_correct_server_update : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (st : Data), (forall c : Client_index, held (sigma (Client c)) = false) -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma Server st)
locks_correct_true_at_head_of_queue : forall (sigma : name -> data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held (sigma (Client x)) = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma x
locks_correct_update_true : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (st' : Data), held st' = true -> at_head_of_queue sigma c -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client c) st')
at_head_of_nil : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index), at_head_of_queue sigma c -> queue (sigma Server) = [] -> False
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')
mutual_exclusion = fun sigma : name -> data => forall m n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client m)) = true -> held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> m = n : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments mutual_exclusion _%function_scope
at_head_of_queue_intro : forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue (sigma Server) = c :: t -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
locks_correct_implies_mutex : forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> mutual_exclusion sigma
locks_correct_locked_at_head : forall (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) (c : Client_index), pDst p = Client c -> pBody p = Locked -> locks_correct_locked sigma p -> at_head_of_queue sigma c
at_head_of_queue = fun (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) => exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = c :: t : (Name -> Data) -> Client_index -> Prop Arguments at_head_of_queue _%function_scope
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : unit) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
locks_correct_locked = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_locked _%function_scope
locks_correct_unlock = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Unlock -> exists c : Client_index, valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_unlock _%function_scope
locks_correct_init = fun (n : Client_index) (H : false = true) => let H0 : False := eq_ind false (fun e : bool => if e then False else True) I true H in False_ind (exists t : list Client_index, [] = n :: t) H0 : locks_correct init_handlers Expanded type for implicit arguments locks_correct_init : forall n : Client_index, held (init_handlers (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (init_handlers Server) = n :: t Arguments locks_correct_init [n]
update_nop_ext : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (h : A), update A_eq_dec sigma h (sigma h) = sigma
LockServ_network_invariant = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => locks_correct_unlock sigma p /\ locks_correct_locked sigma p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments LockServ_network_invariant _%function_scope
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
Name_sind : forall P : Name -> SProp, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_rect : forall P : Name -> Type, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_rec : forall P : Name -> Set, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_ind : forall P : Name -> Prop, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
ServerNetHandler_cases : forall (src : Name) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ServerNetHandler src m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> out = [] /\ ((exists c : Client_index, src = Client c /\ m = Lock /\ queue st' = queue st ++ [c] /\ (queue st = [] /\ ms = [(Client c, Locked)] \/ queue st <> [] /\ ms = [])) \/ m = Unlock /\ queue st' = tl (queue st) /\ (queue st' = [] /\ ms = [] \/ (exists (next : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue st' = next :: t /\ ms = [(Client next, Locked)])) \/ ms = [] /\ st' = st)
ServerNetHandler = fun (src : Name) (m : Msg) => st <- get;; (let q := queue st in match m with | Lock => match src with | Client c => when (null q) (send (src, Locked));; put {| queue := q ++ [c]; held := held st |} | Server => nop end | Unlock => match q with | _ :: x :: xs => put {| queue := x :: xs; held := held st |};; send (Client x, Locked) | _ => put {| queue := []; held := held st |} end | Locked => nop end) : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
ClientNetHandler_cases : forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : unit) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)
SetoidList.equivlistA_nil_eq : forall eqA : ?A -> ?A -> Prop, RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall l : list ?A, SetoidList.equivlistA eqA l [] -> l = [] where ?A : [num_Clients : nat |- Type]
valid_unlock = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pSrc p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_unlock _%list_scope _%bool_scope
valid_locked = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pDst p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_locked _%list_scope _%bool_scope
init_data = fun _ : Name => {| queue := []; held := false |} : Name -> Data
ClientNetHandler = fun (_ : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Locked => put {| queue := []; held := true |};; write_output Locked | _ => nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = [] -> l = []
flat_map_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l : list A), flat_map f l = [] -> l = [] \/ (forall x : A, In x l -> f x = [])
StepFailure_reboot : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name), In h failed -> failed' = remove name_eq_dec h failed -> net' = {| nwPackets := nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (reboot (nwState net h)) |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') [] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
app_eq_nil : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l ++ l' = [] -> l = [] /\ l' = []
filterMap_all_None : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> option B) (xs : list A), (forall x : A, In x xs -> f x = None) -> filterMap f xs = []
